pain_points.description: Difficulty finding event registration details on the website.
quotes: You have to go to your profile. You have to go to the member page. You have to go to your profile.
That's the only way on the web that you can find your ticketed events.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Frequently mentioned and described as frustrating.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users have to navigate multiple tabs to find event registrations.
pain_points.impact: Users experience confusion and frustration, which may lead to missed events.

pain_points.description: Confusion over committee and board member descriptions being hard to find.
quotes: It's not so obvious. That's, yeah, I can't say I looked for that.
Finding those board member descriptions, it's not so obvious.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Mentioned multiple times with significant frustration.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users often express confusion and may abandon their search.
pain_points.impact: Leads to a lack of clarity on committee roles and responsibilities.

pain_points.description: Navigational difficulties between public view and admin view.
quotes: People getting lost and confused in the website.
It's confusing even when you're showing it to them.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Frequently mentioned as a major source of frustration.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users try trial and error to navigate through the site.
pain_points.impact: Decreases user confidence and willingness to engage with the website.

pain_points.description: Lack of visibility for important event registration deadlines.
quotes: I would have actually have to open each thing to see when it's open.
It should be like, of course it's just there.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users manually check each event for registration details.
pain_points.impact: Users may miss deadlines for event registration.

pain_points.description: Inconvenient process for canceling event registrations.
quotes: There's not a link on the event to connect to the committee.
You'd have to like go find the committee.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Mentioned several times with clear frustration.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users resort to sending emails to cancel registrations.
pain_points.impact: Increases effort and may deter users from registering for events.

pain_points.description: Two-factor authentication complicating the initial training process.
quotes: It just was too complicated for the training with the two point verification.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Mentioned as a significant barrier during onboarding.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Training with existing chair credentials instead.
pain_points.impact: New chairs may feel overwhelmed and unprepared.

quotes: It's just a list of links. It's not very visually engaging.
It should be more than just like this, like list.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Frequently mentioned as a major issue.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users sift through lists to find information.
pain_points.impact: Users may feel frustrated and less inclined to use the site.
